snippet.title: THE GOOD GHOULS - 2023 Demo Trailer 👻
snippet.description:
Wishlist and get the Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2137900/The_Good_Ghouls/

Download on Itch.io: https://darntootin.itch.io/the-good-ghouls

Sign up for email updates: https://www.darntootingames.com/

The Good Ghouls is a brawler-meets-adventure game combining beat 'em up gameplay with campy horror fun. Immerse yourself in a wickedly witty world inspired by the golden era of 80s/90s horror movies with an atmospheric art style and killer soundtrack. With its easy to pick up gameplay you can team up with a friend as you delve into this coming-of-age whodunit!

Developed by Darn Tootin Games, LLC
https://www.darntootingames.com/
https://twitter.com/darntootingames

Trailer Music by White Bat Audio
https://whitebataudio.com/

#indiegames #spooky #horrorgaming  #gaming #spookygames #beatemup #adventuregame #cozygaming
